pages.title: Energizing Orb
pages.text: An Energizing Orb is used to Energize materials. It doesn't require energy but it requires Energizing Rods to Energize materials. Materials are placed on it by right-click the Energizing Orb with a material in your hand. $(p)Items will Energize faster if more and higher tier Energizing Rods are linked to an Energizing Orb.

pages.name: Energizing
pages.text: This setup speeds up Energizing by using more Energizing Rods.
